column1: Local Foods////Tuscan kale: Excellent. This is by far the best side
column2: and it is the best kale salad I have ever had. I always get double servings of kale for my two included sides. The kale is given enough time to marinate in the dressing to soften the fibers a bit
column3: and the raisins add the most delightful burst of sweetness in every other bite.
